summary:
Adds an armor and clothing store with over 100 new items. This is just for fun, please know that.
It's on the south shore of lake Ilinalta, north of Falkreath, West of the Guardian stones.
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils DMRA Store
Author: Edhildil
04,02,2018
ver1


Adds an armor and clothing store with over 100 new items. This is just for fun, please know that.
It's on the south shore of lake Ilinalta, north of Falkreath, West of the Guardian stones.

These Items are female only and based off of DMRA body. They are all one size (Double Melons Round Ass) so sliders are dissabled. Most of these have no body physics as I don't like the way the breasts deform with physics. Includes crafting stations for armor, weapons, clothing, potions, and enchanting. The Body is part of the clothing/armor.

For those who know me, I lost access to my original nexus account from 2008. New Email, phone, computer etc. I was offline for over a year and now my nexus account wont let me log in due to all the security stuff. Argh!!! If anyone can help me get it back please PM me on my new account (edhildilsreturn) Thank You.

Requirements:
============
Dawnguard
Dragonborn
Apachii Female Hair (works with Apachii Skyhair)
CBBE Female Compatible Textures
XP32 Skeleton
HDT High Heels System

Highly Recommended:
Daedric Armor and Weapon Improvment by Garryg

Install:
=============
Copy/paste data file from this mod into your data folder

Unistall:
=============
Delete included files or untick esp.

Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.

Usage:
==========
If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod.Â 
Edhildil for the Armors (except Bubblegum Suits, that is Edhildil and BB Drac) and statues.
